sources.title: This Is the Night (1932)
sources.description: When Stephen, the husband of Gerald’s mistress, Claire, discovers a pair of tickets for their planned trip to Venice, Gerald must invent a wife to cover their tracks. He is then forced to hire a woman to play “his wife” when Stephen insists he and Claire accompany them to Venice. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/this-is-the-night-1932/

metadata.Plot: An affair is almost exposed when Claire's husband unexpectedly returns early from the Summer Olympics.
metadata.Writer: Henri Falk, Benjamin Glazer, Avery Hopwood
metadata.Actors: Roland Young, Thelma Todd, Cary Grant
